entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 08:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: N 45 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets mixed with freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain in the morning. Periods of freezing rain beginning near noon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
